div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Sept. 18, 1917. CZECH CLASSES OPENED (Summary)

body.p: Although the number of students at Carter Harrison High School who are enrolled in Czech classes is larger than last season, nevertheless it is disproportionately small considering the total number of students of Czech descent who are studying at that school. Parents should give this some thought.....
This season we have seven Czech classes, one of which is taught by our Professor Boh. Kral. The classes in the history, literature, and culture of the Czech people are particularly small.....
